shortbio: I am a doctoral student at the Universidade Federal do Espírito Santo (UFES) and researcher at the Multimedia and Networking Research Lab (LPRM) since November 2021. I hold a Master's degree in Computer Science from the same university, and a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from the Universidade Estadual do Sudoeste da Bahia UESB
